product_name: Columbia Drainmaker II Board Shorts - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Whether your idea of a great day on the beach means catching waves or perfecting your jump serve, the Columbia Drainmaker II board shorts keep you comfortable thanks to lightweight, quick-dry fabric. Lightweight, quick-dry stretch-polyester fabric features Omni-Shield(TM) technology to resist water and stains. UPF 50 sun protection shields skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Zippered side pocket; drawstring-adjustable waistband. Closeout.
short_description: Whether your idea of a great day on the beach means catching waves or perfecting your jump serve, the Columbia Drainmaker II board shorts keep you comfortable thanks to lightweight, quick-dry fabric.
